page.title: Handelssoftware MK3
page.t: Your trader \033G%s\033X with ID \033G%s\033X has been attacked in sector \033G%s\033X by \033R%s\033X.\n
%sHe's initiating emergency jump routines to \033G%s\033X. He will take up work from there.
%sHe can't jump and therefore docks at station \033G%s\033X. He'll wait there until the threat is gone.

The homebase \033G%s\033X of your trader \033G%s\033X in sector \033G%s\033X has not enough money. There are only \033G%s\033X credits available while the pilot needs at least \033G%s\033X. He continues to work under protest.
Choose amount of wares to stay on board:
No lockable amounts of wares have been found.
Hint: MK3 traders can use fighter drones MkII...

page.title: Blacklist Manager
page.t: This manager modifies the global station/sector-blacklist used by sector- and universe traders.
Select sector or station to remove from permanent blacklist.
This list is being maintained by traders to lock stations they want to trade with, and to communicate sectors with potential threats.

page.title: commands
page.descr: Long version of commandos. These are the commandos assigned to ships using the commandconsole. Page 2010 and 2011 belong together and hold short and long versions of the same commands

page.title: commands
page.descr: Short version of commandos. These are the commandos assigned to ships using the commandconsole. Page 2010 and 2011 belong together and hold short and long versions of the same commands

page.title: command info
page.t: This command starts the Blacklist Manager for Trade Command Software MK3. You can create and manage a global blacklist of sectors and stations, which all MK3 traders will then ignore as flight destinations.\n{2022,99993}
Manages amounts of wares to stay board.
This command indicates that the trader is awaiting a shipment from the Goner delivery service.
This command indicates that the trader is upgrading his shields.
This command indicates that the trader is buying tunings or cargo extensions.
This command indicates that the trader is buying fight drones or other hardware.
This command indicates that the trader is currently refuelling. (Currently not used!)
This command indicates that the trader is currently scanning for a profitable trade route.

page.title: Boardcomp. objects
page.descr: Quad line groups for ware factory pairs or twins (spoken by Boardcomputer)
page.t: The repair costs for a damaged Mk3 trader.
The salary of an Mk3 trader.
